constants.name: neutron_algorithm
constants.header: Translation table for type of algorithm used for emissivity reconstruction with the neutron detector

int.name: tikhonov_1
int.description: Tikhonov regularization with first derivative objective functional

int.name: tikhonov_2
int.description: Tikhonov regularization with second derivative objective functional

int.name: tikhonov_3
int.description: Tikhonov regularization with Minimum Fischer objective functional
